type.name: T:Elysium.Parameters.Animation
type.summary: Represents a class that manages the settings of an animation.

property.name: P:Elysium.Parameters.Animation.DefaultDuration
property.summary: Gets or sets the default duration of an animation.
property.value: Default duration of an animation. The default value is 0 sec.

method.name: M:Elysium.Parameters.Animation.GetDefaultDuration(System.Windows.DependencyObject)
method.summary: Returns the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being got.
method.exception: The parameter has a value null.

method.name: M:Elysium.Parameters.Animation.SetDefaultDuration(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Windows.Duration)
method.summary: Sets the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being set.
method.exception: The parameter has a value null.

property.name: P:Elysium.Parameters.Animation.MinimumDuration
property.summary: Gets or sets the minimum duration of an animation.
property.value: Minimum duration of an animation. The default value is 0.2 sec.

method.name: M:Elysium.Parameters.Animation.GetMinimumDuration(System.Windows.DependencyObject)
method.summary: Returns the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being got.
method.exception: The parameter has a value null.

method.name: M:Elysium.Parameters.Animation.SetMinimumDuration(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Windows.Duration)
method.summary: Sets the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being set.
method.exception: The parameter has a value null.

property.name: P:Elysium.Parameters.Animation.OptimumDuration
property.summary: Gets or sets the optimum duration of an animation.
property.value: Optimum duration of an animation. The default value is 0.5 sec.

method.name: M:Elysium.Parameters.Animation.GetOptimumDuration(System.Windows.DependencyObject)
method.summary: Returns the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being got.
method.exception: The parameter has a value null.

method.name: M:Elysium.Parameters.Animation.SetOptimumDuration(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Windows.Duration)
method.summary: Sets the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being set.
method.exception: The parameter has a value null.

property.name: P:Elysium.Parameters.Animation.MaximumDuration
property.summary: Gets or sets the maximum duration of an animation.
property.value: Maximum duration of an animation. The default value is 1 sec.

method.name: M:Elysium.Parameters.Animation.GetMaximumDuration(System.Windows.DependencyObject)
method.summary: Returns the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being got.
method.exception: The parameter has a value null.

method.name: M:Elysium.Parameters.Animation.SetMaximumDuration(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Windows.Duration)
method.summary: Sets the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being set.
method.exception: The parameter has a value null.
